definition: lit. mole cricket and ants/fig. tiny individuals with no power

sentences.english: Lives, is extraordinary small just like ants.
Under the pretext of opposition to the US-British occupation of the terrorists, depending on human life such as ants.
sentences.chinese: 借口反对美英占领的恐怖主义者，视人命如蝼蚁。

sentences.english: Horses small as ants thundering through the grass.
sentences.chinese: 长草中疾驰而过的马匹有如蝼蚁。

sentences.english: Two angry gods hurling boulders at one another while the ants scurry below.
sentences.chinese: 两个愤怒的上帝互殴，下面的蝼蚁就要遭殃了。

definition: a mantis trying to stop a chariot (idiom)/to overrate oneself and attempt sth impossible/also written 螳臂擋車|螳臂挡车[tang2 bi4 dang3 che1]
lit. an ant trying to shake a tree/to overrate oneself (idiom)
insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
lit. an ant trying to shake a big tree (idiom)/fig. to overrate one's own strength/also written 蚍蜉撼樹|蚍蜉撼树[pi2 fu2 han4 shu4]
small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children
